title: BLACK+DECKER MarkIT Picture Hanging Kit (BDMKIT101C)
description: Family photos and wall art can make your house a home, so display them professionally using the BLACK+DECKER MarkIT picture-hanging tool as your guide. This handy tool is simple to use and helps ensure precision marks for drilled holes or nail placement. No more wasting time making unnecessary adjustments and extra holes in your wall. Ideal for both single and dual-mount frames, it’s designed with a built-in bubble level, as well as on-board storage for hanging hardware.
